title: Greenwich Bay Trading Company Fall & Winter Soap Sampler 15 pack of 1.9oz bars - Bundle 15 items
features: French-milled, luxurious vegetable soaps enriched with shea butter, essential oils and natural extracts in captivating botanical scents.
Paper-wrapped and offered in a 1.9oz mini soap square. Each Soap measures 2"x2"x1"
Great Fall and Winter Fragrances. Perfect for the holiday season.
Poly bagged and ready for your packaging.
Top Quality Soaps Made right here in the USA
description: BOTANICAL SOAPS French-milled, luxurious vegetable soaps enriched with shea butter, essential oils and natural extracts in captivating botanical scents. Paper wrapped and offered in a 1.9 ounce mini soap square. This sampler consists of one 1.9 ounce bar of each of the following fragrances! APPLE CIDER SHEA BUTTER Soap enriched with shea butter & apple blossom oil. AUTUMN GARDEN Bar soap enriched with shea butter & cocoa butter. AUTUMN HARVEST Bar soap enriched with shea butter & cocoa butter and blended with exfoliating organic oatmeal & wheat bran. HARVEST APPLE Soap enriched with shea butter & apple blossom oil. SPICED PUMPKIN Bar soap enriched with shea butter, pumpkin seed & clove oil. CRANBERRY CHESTNUT Soap enriched with shea butter, cranberry oil & chestnut oil. FRESH HOLLY Soap enriched with shea butter & eucalyptus oil. FROSTED SUGAR PLUM Bar soap enriched with shea butter, plum butter & pure cane sugar. GINGERBREAD Bar soap enriched with shea butter, ginger, nutmeg & honey. MISTLETOE Soap enriched with shea butter & cocoa butter. PEPPERMINT FROST Soap enriched with shea butter and peppermint oil. SNOW LILY Soap enriched with shea butter and cocoa butter. SUGAR PEAR AND WINTERBERRY Bar soap enriched with virgin olive oil, shea butter and pure cane sugar. WINTERFIELD Soap enriched with shea butter and cocoa butter. WINTER GARDEN Bar soap enriched with shea butter and nectarine oil and blended with exfoliating wheat bran.
